mapper.insert: insert into route( route_no, route_time, route_km, route_start_time, route_end_time, route_start, route_end, bus_no, route_way ) values( #{routeNo}, #{routeTime}, #{routeKm}, #{routeStartTime}, #{routeEndTime}, #{routeStart}, #{routeEnd}, #{busNo}, #{routeWay} )
mapper.select: select * from route order by route_no asc
mapper.update: update route set route_time = #{routeTime}, route_km = #{routeKm}, route_start_time = #{routeStartTime}, route_end_time = #{routeEndTime}, route_start = #{routeStart}, route_end = #{routeEnd}, bus_no = #{busNo}, route_way = #{routeWay} where route_no = #{routeNo}
